Articles.Content:
go to Duna and drop a rover there

for instructions click here

instructions

.this is the mods you have to have

.airbags

choose one of the three rovers to send to duna

.curiosity

.Mer A

.or make your own

the second part is you must land the curiosity to the head mast cam on duna

or the Mer to the face on duna

last but not least the make you own to the pyramid

and i would suggest to use the Prometheus solar rover for the Mer and have a top and a heat shield

Please read: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24898-Challenge-Submission-Guide

I have done the curiosity before with skycrane, but I dunno where the mast is.

alpha tech you've already previously been recommended to read the Challenge Submission Guidelines, please do so before posting more challenges so that you can design sensible challenges that people are willing to do.

Looking at popular challenges or simply at the general layout of challenges people post should give you a better idea on how to create a successful challenge.

With that said, thread closed. Please make a new thread once you've reviewed the necessary information.
